title: Adverb collection 2
sentences: I used to go to the cinema often.
First we must read the documents.
When did you see him last?
I searched everywhere for my key.
I can find my glasses nowhere.
I met him at the supermarket the day before yesterday.
The day after tomorrow I am going to Berlin.
By now I understand almost everything.
The car is beautiful, however it is very expensive.
It is raining, but we are going for a walk anyway.
I am sick, therefore I am staying at home.
Hurry up, otherwise we will miss the bus.
In the evening I mostly drink a tea.
I am talking to my mother right now.
Have you finally done your homework?
The teacher is standing at the front by the board.
We prefer to sit in the back in the car.
Biegen Sie an der Kreuzung nach
My house is on the right side.
I don't understand that at all.
dictionary:
früher - earlier / formerly
später - later
zuerst - first / at first
zuletzt - last / recently
überall - everywhere
nirgendwo - nowhere
vorgestern - day before yesterday
übermorgen - day after tomorrow
mittlerweile - by now / meanwhile
allerdings - however
trotzdem - nevertheless / anyway
deshalb - therefore / that's why
sonst - otherwise
selten - rarely
meistens - mostly
gerade - just / right now
endlich - finally
plötzlich - suddenly
vorn - in front / at the front
hinten - in the back / behind
oben - upstairs / above
unten - downstairs / below
links - left
rechts - right
überhaupt - at all / anyway
die Hausaufgaben - homework
die Tafel - chalkboard / board
die Kreuzung - intersection
